thread.title: Advisory: R.J. Reynolds reaches agreement with New York on Master Settlement Agreement payment disputes
thread.title_full: Advisory: R.J. Reynolds reaches agreement with New York on Master Settlement Agreement payment disputes - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Advisory: R.J. Reynolds reaches agreement with New York on Master Settlement Agreement payment disputes
text:
R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company
WINSTON-SALEM, N.C. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company has reached an agreement with the State of New York to settle 11 years of claims related to the company's Master Settlement Agreement (MSA) payments to the state.
Go to R.J. Reynolds' website, www.rjrt.com , or Reynolds American Inc.'s website, www.reynoldsamerican.com , to read the full release.
Web Disclosure
RAI's website, www.reynoldsamerican.com , is the primary source of publicly disclosed news about RAI and its operating companies. We use the website as our primary means of distributing quarterly earnings and other company news. We encourage investors and others to register at www.reynoldsamerican.com to receive alerts when news about the company has been posted.
R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company, an indirect subsidiary of Reynolds American Inc. (NYSE: RAI), is the second-largest tobacco company in the United States . To learn more about how Reynolds American and its operating companies are transforming the tobacco industry, visit TransformingTobacco.com.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/advisory-rj-reynolds-reaches-agreement-with-new-york-on-master-settlement-agreement-payment-disputes-300162931.html
